groupSPV.controller

Class WalletController

  • java.lang.Object
    • groupSPV.controller.WalletController

  • public class WalletController
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Frankie Fasola, James Donnell, Spencer Escalante, Trevor Silva Interfaces between the client and the wallet by wrapping the wallet methods.
